There is **no maximum limit** to the amount you can buy or sell in GFunds. There is also **no minimum holding period** for investments in GFunds.

However, there is a **minimum maintaining balance to keep owning a fund** for your GFunds below:

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **Fund Name** | **Minimum Maintaining Balance** |
| ATRAM Peso Money Market Fund | PHP 1 |
| ATRAM Total Return Peso Bond Fund | PHP 1 |
| ATRAM Philippine Equity Smart Index Fund | PHP 1 |
| ATRAM Philippine Sustainable Development and Growth Fund | PHP 1 |
| Philippine Stock Index Fund | PHP 1 |
| ALFM Global Multi-Asset Income Fund | PHP 500 |
| ATRAM Global Technology Feeder Fund | PHP 500 |
| ATRAM Global Consumer Trends Feeder Fund | PHP 500 |
| ATRAM Global Equity Opportunity Fund | PHP 500 |
| ATRAM Global Health Care Fund | PHP 500 |
| ATRAM Global Infra Equity Fund | PHP 500 |

### **Initial minimum top up (first Buy Order)**

**Local**

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **ATRAM** | PHP 50 |
| **BPI** | PHP 50 |

**Global**

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **ATRAM** | PHP 1,000 |
| **BPI** | PHP 1,000 |

### **Succeeding minimum top ups**

**Local**

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **ATRAM** | PHP 50 |
| **BPI** | PHP 1 |

**Global**

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **ATRAM** | PHP 500 |
| **BPI** | PHP 1 |
